description:
Claiomh and Majic return to the inn and are attacked by Ryan and Helpart. Ryan captures Claiomh, and Helpart overpowers Majic using the sword Freak Diamond. Meanwhile, Orphen finds Lottecia and tracks her down, but it was a trap. Lottecia led Orphen to somewhere secluded so she could ambush him!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Shine Down Upon My Ambush, Moonlight
